Question
========

In SPSS, if you run a factorial ANOVA in the General Linear Model module, checking the ‘Homogeneity tests’ option, which test appears in the output?

Answerlist
----------
* Bonferroni’s test
* Tukey’s test
* Levene’s test
* Mauchly’s test

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
